alert.note: Alert for Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 3:10AM CST until January 02 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches, sleet accumulations up to one half of an inch, and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...In Missouri, Audrain MO, Monroe MO, Pike MO and Ralls MO Counties. In Illinois, Pike IL County. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Illinois, the latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Missouri, the latest road conditions can be obtained at traveler.modot.org/map or by calling 1-888-275-6636.
